title: *fixed* Navigon MobileNavigator 6.2 for Pocket PC with CRACK
description:
On my last attempt at seeding this I noticed the autorun wasn&#039;t working correctly, so here it is again fixed. Sorry about that. 

Info: There isn&#039;t really an easy way to obtain this app since the installations and cracks are hard to come by, not bundled together, and have very little documentation.  So here it is with all the guess work taken out, and all the necessary files in one torrent. Enjoy!

You will need to have a Memory card reader for this installation.

1.) Format memory card using card reader
2.) Move the 2577 folder onto the root of your SD Card
3.) Put the SD card in your PPC.  The correct installation should happen automatically.  Be sure to choose Memory Card as the installation location

*optional* After install, erase the 4 files from SD card to save space.

4.) Uninstall MobileNavigator 6 from PPC (this step is also optional, but recommended by Navigon)
5.) Put SD card back into Memory card reader, Run PDA_Update_6.2.0_Build_818.exe from update folder and follow instructions
6.) On SD Card, navigate to the NM6 Folder and replace NM6.exe with the NM6.exe located in the Update/Crack folder. 

This installation contains no maps. When you obtain maps, be sure that they are not read only.  Create a folder inside of NM6 called maps, and store your maps there.   Navigon will read them automatically.

-Dockular
